ing: 1 (1 ounce) package McCormickÂ® Grill MatesÂ® Baja Citrus Marinade
1/2 cup mango nectar or orange juice
1 (12 ounce) can canned ham, such as SpamÂ® Classic, cut into small cubes
des: "Get party-ready with our Hawaiian Ham and Pineapple Salsa. A fruity salsa of pineapple, jalapeÃ±o and mango nectar is the perfect base for salty chunks of cooked canned ham seasoned with Grill MatesÂ® Baja Citrus Marinade. Serve it inside hollowed out pineapple bowls for a festive touch."
ins:
Mix Marinade Mix, mango nectar, honey and lime juice in large bowl. Remove 1/4 cup of the marinade mixture; set aside.
Cook cubed canned ham and 1/4 cup of the reserved marinade mixture in large skillet on medium heat until lightly browned. Remove from heat.
Stir pineapple, onion and jalapeno into remaining marinade mixture in large bowl until well blended. Top with ham mixture. Sprinkle with nuts. Serve dip with tortilla chips.
